original_text: And I will grant authority to my two witnesses, and they will prophesy for 1,260 days, clothed in sackcloth.”
korean_text: 내가 나의 두 증인에게 권세를 주리니 그들이 굵은 베옷을 입고 천이백육십 일을 예언하리라

sentences.original_text: And I will grant authority to my two witnesses
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 내가 내 두 증인에게 권세를 주겠으니

sentences.original_text: and they will prophesy for 1,260 days
